title: What should I do if I need to cross over people to avoid bid'ah during congregational dua?
transcript: from India so they do congregational Dua people will be praying in the Rose to leave I have to cross over over the people in my front row but that is difficult so what should I do no problem you can remain seated but do not indulge in their congregational Dua so don't say aan don't pay attention to them just do your AAR Subhan Allah Subhan Allah while they're making their Dua read read the last three and the likes and Allah Knows Best
